translations.chinese: 漢王下令：軍士不幸死者， 吏為衣衾棺斂，轉送其家。
translations.english: King Han issued an order: For soldiers who unfortunately die, officials shall provide burial clothes, coffins, and shrouds, and transport them home.
The four directions turned their hearts to him.

translations.chinese: 項羽自知少助食盡，韓信又進兵擊楚，羽患之。
translations.english: Xiang Yu knew he had few helpers and food was exhausted. Han Xin again advanced troops to attack Chu. Xiang Yu was troubled by this.

translations.chinese: 漢遣陸賈說羽，請太公，羽弗聽。
translations.english: Han sent Lu Jia to persuade Xiang Yu to return the Duke of Tai. Xiang Yu did not listen.

translations.chinese: 漢復使侯公說羽，羽乃 與漢約，中分天下，割鴻溝以西為漢，以東為楚。
translations.english: Han again sent Hou Gong to persuade Xiang Yu. Xiang Yu then made a treaty with Han to divide the world in half, giving Honggou west to Han and east to Chu.
